message: The National Human Trafficking Resource Center has documented 39 cases of human trafficking in Oklahoma so far in 2017. Two-thirds were cases of sex trafficking, with the others categorized as labor trafficking or some other type. The cases are likely an undercount, because many victims don't report their abuse.

data.description: SEP 30, 2017 - A few years ago, a young man who had burned his eyes welding without protection came into the emergency room in Lawton. There were warning signs he was a victim of labor trafficking,…
data.title: Oklahoma nurse warns human trafficking 'right under our noses'
